attributes.review: my phone had been working just fine, that is until i got this app. ever since i downloaded it my phone keeps shutting down and restarting. the app crashes within seconds of it opening. i tried restarting my phone once after it got stuck on the app. it would not. i had to wait until it died. would not recommend!!
attributes.title: messing my phone up TREMENDOUSLY

attributes.review: The one that was on my mom is the one that I was going to get you for a couple of minutes and then I just had to go back and get my kids for the night and we’re having fun with y’all so we don’t know what to say about the aunt or if y’all have anything going on with her and she doesn’t want anything else so yeah I had fun on the kazoo. I just got a new roller coaster with a little kids in the whole world...
attributes.title: TERRIBLE ROLLERBLADES

attributes.review: This app is constantly making my phone make random alerts and makes me lose battery life on my phone. And to make things worse the app glitches my phone to randomly send text messages to people that make no sense what so ever. And I know it this app because when I deleted it my phone started acting normal. This app is horrible I highly suggest you not use it!!!
attributes.title: This is trash

attributes.review: Ok now that i got you hooked with the title let me tell you why i am doing this. Like a lot of people i am a tik tok user. This man... no this person is trying to take it away!!!!!! Tik Tok is a way for people to express them selves. This person wants to take that away!!!! And of you want tik tok to go away for good then fine leave a good review. But just know tik tok is a while family and we will fight for it!!!!!! Unlike him.
attributes.title: This app is a demon here to steal your soul

attributes.review: I got this app to get notifications on anything Trump related. After I first opened it and got it set up I was getting notification that my iCloud and gmail need the passwords changed! This app with take your info without consent!! Do not get!! Also. It tracked my child’s location and after learning about the rumors about what happened with Trump and kids I did not feel safe having this app! DO NOT GET!!!!!
attributes.title: Don’t get!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app just to screw around, maybe make America great again, but after just a few minutes of play time I find myself fantasizing about border walls, refusing to wear a mask, and spewing racial slurs uncontrollably.  I didn’t want this!  I’ve also noticed that this app causes me to break out and lose hair, is this part of becoming a Trump supporter?? All around bad experience, 0/10 cannot recommend.
attributes.title: Absolute Nightmare

attributes.review: My fish is missing the kids in my basement are gone I’m so sad this app ruined my life now I’m lonely now I can’t talk to my fish at 3 o’clock in the morning about my problems or kids in my basement my shark is in a coma I miss him. the muffins are in the freezer James Charles keep scaring me in the middle of my shower The FBI came to my house and killed my pet cucumber today for Christmas so I’m going back home and then I will be back to finding kids for my basement✨✨🍄🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: Worst app ever🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.review: Almost immediately after I got this app my phone started to get slower, and every time I’m on the app it drains my battery. BUT WAIT there’s more, while on the app after about 15 minutes ( if my phone has not already died) then I will get glitched out the app, after that my phone won’t let me do anything intel I completely power off my phone and turn it back on. WORST APP EVER!!!!! 😡
attributes.title: Just delete this app

attributes.review: This app does not work at all. As soon as I entered my phone number my phone started glitching and froze. It stayed like this for almost thirty minutes. When my phone came back and started working, I kept getting notifications from almost two years ago such as new photo memory. I kept trying to download the app and redownload it but it kept crashing. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Not to alarm anyone but the person who is in charge of this app is racist, homophobic, sexist, transphobic, hates ALL religions except his own, let’s children immigrants sit in cages while being tortured, starved, raped, and killed, doesn’t understand the value of a persons life AND spends the majority of the country’s money on MILITARY which doesn’t make sense because WE ARE NOT IN A WAR. If you download and truly use this app you are supporting a fascist. have a terrible day 🧚🏻☺️💘
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE
